channel.title: Npc's and player's can walk through walls on my server!?!
channel.description: Well theres a few places its not glitchy on my server but most places it is...exaple: In the kalphite queen lair, i spawned a kbd in the first level at the last room and as soon as you take the rope down there he walks through all the walls straight too you even if your not really close to him...wtf!?!? pretty much every npc on my server walks through any object?? wth is going on and how do i fix this!? Thansk in advance....samy109 :confused: :confused:

item.title: Npc's and player's can walk through walls on my server!?!

Then make it so that it can’t walk that far…
